## Question interface

Describes the data required to display a question in the form

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Question 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [ariaLabel?](./dynamic-forms.question.arialabel.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  [color?](./dynamic-forms.question.color.md) | "primary" \| "accent" | <i>(Optional)</i> The color theme of the field |
|  [hint?](./dynamic-forms.question.hint.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A hint helping the user fill out the field |
|  [label?](./dynamic-forms.question.label.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A label describing the field |
|  [placeholder?](./dynamic-forms.question.placeholder.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A placeholder value for the field |
|  [width?](./dynamic-forms.question.width.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The width of the field. Use css syntax. |
